cause.description:
The mission of the "Rock for History" benefit concert is to involve the youth in raising money to preserve local historic landmarks in the Chartiers Valley area through a fun and innovative way.

ROCK FOR HISTORY II: Battle of the Bands - March 8, 2008
It will benefit two historic landmarks. 50% of the money raised will be given to the historic Neville House on the Woodville Plantation in Collier Twp., PA, and 50% will be given to the Andrew Carnegie Free Library & Music Hall. A goal of $3000 is set. This year it is a Battle of the Bands and the prize is a $100 gift certificate to Guitar Center. "Rock for History II" will feature 24 Hour Taco Shop, Greedo Shot First, Entourage, Hollywood Boulevard, Height Line, Lakeview, Keyvan and more.
http://www.woodvilleplantation.org
http://www.carnegiecarnegie.org

PLEASE DO NOT DONATE THROUGH THIS WEBSITE. If you are interested in donating than please indicate that in a wall post and you will be contacted with an address where you can mail the donation. 1. To involve the youth in the preservation of local historic landmarks.
cause.mission: The mission of "Rock for History" is to involve the youth in the preservation of historic landmarks in the local community.
cause.name: "Rock for History"
